text: Nagra zamagripi manugenka, Kagra, Nagripi mani'nane, hanige'za zamagra magoke zamarimpa hu'za manigahaze. Ana hananke'za ama mopafi vahe'mo'za nege'za, Kagra hunantankena ama mopafina e'noe hu'za keza antahiza nehanagenka, Nagri'ma kavesi nante'nana kna hunka, zamavesi nezmantane huza keza antahiza hugahaze.
